Name: Suspending meter parking regulations on the Asian Lunar New Year.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to suspending meter parking regulations on the Asian Lunar New Year.

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Transportation
This Introduction was Filed (End of Session)

Summary: This bill would suspend parking meters and muni-meters on Asian Lunar New Year
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:
      Section 1. Subchapter 2 of title 19 of the administrative code of the city of New York is amended by adding a new section 19-163.3 to read as follows:
      � 19-163.3. a. No parking meter or muni-meter shall be activated on Asian Lunar New Year.
      b. The date of the Asian Lunar New Year is the same as the date set forth in subdivision c of section 19-163 of the code. 
      � 2. This local law takes effect immediately.
       
GZ/LF/CCF
LS 487/Int. 112-2014
LS 1028
01/04/2018 5:25 pm
